name: Development Service Wiring (Organized)
description: Organized dependency injection configuration - defines which service implementations to use by category
WARNING: ⚠️  This is SERVICE WIRING, NOT runtime configuration!
runtimeConfig: All runtime configuration (database URLs, ports, keys) must be in environment variables (.env file)
purpose: This file defines WHICH classes to use for each interface, organized by service category

IUserRepository.description: Mock user repository with test data

IMonitoringTargetRepository.description: Mock monitoring target repository with test data

ISpeedTestResultRepository.description: Mock speed test result repository with test data

IAlertRuleRepository.description: Mock alert rule repository with test data

IIncidentEventRepository.description: Mock incident event repository with test data

INotificationRepository.description: Mock notification repository with test data

IPushSubscriptionRepository.description: Mock push subscription repository with test data

IUserSpeedTestPreferenceRepository.description: Mock user speed test preference repository

ISpeedTestUrlRepository.description: Mock speed test URL repository with test data

ITargetRepository.description: Mock legacy target repository - alias for IMonitoringTargetRepository

IMonitorService.description: Mock monitor service with hardcoded in-memory data

ISpeedTestService.description: Real speed test service for network performance testing

IAuthService.description: Mock authentication service with hardcoded users

IEventBus.description: Real event bus for proper service communication
